page.title: 18Morwenstow - A Child's Day
page.content: I woke at 7:30, had a wash and cleaned my teeth. Then I had breakfast and got dressed. I walked down to Emma's place and waited for the car that takes me to school. On the way I saw a pheasant in the hedge; it was so bright! At school I talked to my friends for a while then at 9:00 the bell rang and we started lessons. My first lesson was Maths and I had to make some pyramids. Break was at 10:45. I ate my lunch and played football with my friends. After break I had English,a good story about climbing Everset. After dinner I play- football and then had Nature Study in the shrubbery. There was another play- time in the afternoon. Afterwards I swam in the school pool and then I went home at 3:30. by Andrew Gifford, aged 11
